# `datasci`

[![Latest version on PyPI](https://badge.fury.io/py/datasci.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/datasci/)

Install from PyPI:

```sh
pip install datasci
```

Install in development mode:

```sh
pip install -e .
```


## Testing

```sh
python setup.py test
```
